tool_description: from broken text to proper text in seconds.
name: textcorrect
title: textcorrect

api_list.name: /prediction
api_list.description: from broken text to proper text.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://textcorrect.p.rapidapi.com/prediction"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "textcorrect.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

import requests

url = "https://textcorrect.p.rapidapi.com/prediction"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
